alert.note: Alert for Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:13PM CDT until May 22 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Mcclellan, or 19 miles south of Pampa, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Alanreed and Lake Mcclellan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
